title: Community Garden Cleanup
description: Join us to clean up the local community garden! We'll be weeding, planting new flowers, and preparing the beds for the upcoming season. All skill levels are welcome.

title: Local Food Bank Drive
description: Help us sort and pack donations for the local food bank. Your efforts will directly help families in need in our community.

title: Riverbank Restoration Project
description: We are planting trees and clearing debris to restore the beautiful riverbank. This is a great opportunity to enjoy nature while giving back.

title: Senior Center Meet-and-Greet
description: Spend an afternoon with the residents of the Golden Years Senior Center. We'll be playing board games, sharing stories, and helping with small tasks. Your presence will bring a lot of joy!
